pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, December 5, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.    

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a candle lighting ceremony in celebration of Hanukkah, and will deliver brief remarks.

Room 200, Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Note for media:

    • Open coverage for remarks
